headline: Government Announces New Economic Stimulus Package
summary: In a bid to boost the economy, the government unveiled a comprehensive stimulus package aimed at supporting businesses and individuals affected by recent economic challenges.
details: The stimulus package includes tax incentives for small businesses.
Funds will be allocated to infrastructure projects to create jobs.
Social welfare programs will be expanded to assist vulnerable populations.
